tool_description: Get Products Info To Make a Full Stack E-commerce Store
name: Ecommerce Store
title: Ecommerce Store

api_list.name: Products
api_list.description: This will fetch some products from our ecom store
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ecommerce-store.p.rapidapi.com/products"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ecommerce-store.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ecommerce-store.p.rapidapi.com/products"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ecommerce-store.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
